verses.verse: Now Hiram <S%H2438><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> with cedar <S%H730><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> masons, <S%H2796><s%> <S%H7023><s%> and carpenters, <S%H2796><s%> <S%H6086><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> for him.

And David <S%H1732><s%> realized <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had established <S%H3559><s%> him as king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> [and] that his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> was highly <S%H4605><s%> exalted, <S%H5375><s%> for the sake <S%H5668><s%> of His people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> at Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of more <S%H5750><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H3205><s%> born <S%H3205><s%> [to him] in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> Shammua, <S%H8051><s%> Shobab, <S%H7727><s%> Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> Solomon, <S%H8010><s%>

When the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had been anointed <S%H4886><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up in search <S%H1245><s%> of David; <S%H1732><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it and went <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H6440><s%> them.
Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had come <S%H935><s%> and made <S%H6584><s%> a raid <S%H6584><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Shall I go <S%H5927><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>? And wilt Thou give <S%H5414><s%> them into my hand <S%H3027><s%>?" Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Go <S%H5927><s%> up, for I will give <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

So they came <S%H5927><s%> up to Baal-perazim, and David <S%H1732><s%> defeated <S%H5221><s%> them there; <S%H8033><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has broken <S%H6555><s%> through <S%H6555><s%> my enemies <S%H340><s%> by my hand, <S%H3027><s%> like the breakthrough <S%H6556><s%> of waters. <S%H4325><s%>" Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> Baal-perazim.

And they abandoned <S%H5800><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> so David <S%H1732><s%> gave <S%H559><s%> the order <S%H559><s%> and they were burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>
And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> made <S%H6584><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> another <S%H3254><s%> raid <S%H6584><s%> in the valley. <S%H6010><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "You shall not go <S%H5927><s%> up after <S%H310><s%> them; circle <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> behind <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, and come <S%H935><s%> at them in front <S%H4136><s%> of the balsam <S%H1057><s%> trees. <S%H1057><s%>

"And it shall be when you hear <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of marching <S%H6807><s%> in the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the balsam <S%H1057><s%> trees, <S%H1057><s%> then <S%H227><s%> you shall go <S%H3318><s%> out to battle, <S%H4421><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> will have gone <S%H3318><s%> out before <S%H6440><s%> you to strike <S%H5221><s%> the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>"

And David <S%H1732><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, and they struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> from Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> even as far <S%H5704><s%> as Gezer. <S%H1507><s%>

Then the fame <S%H8034><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out into all <S%H3605><s%> the lands; <S%H776><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H5414><s%> the fear <S%H6343><s%> of him on all <S%H3605><s%> the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
